creator: thegreeneyl
title: UrbanPlay
description: A participatory art installation in Amsterdam using 200,000 euro cents to create a mural on a 20x40m square. The mural spelled out the sentence “Obsessions make my life worse and my work better.”
steps: Concept and Planning: Develop the concept of using the project budget (2000 Euros, converted to 200,000 euro cents) as the installation material and measure the space.
Design: Create the image for the mural using Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop, working with limited copper shades to match the coins.

Programming: Scale the image so that one pixel equals one coin, save the image to a gif consisting of 4 colors. Run a custom Processing script to generate tiles (One tile fits 37x37 euro cents), export a pdf with one page per tile to be used as a template during the installation.
Installation: With the help of volunteers, sort the coins into 4 different shades and carefully place them over the 300 sqm area according to the template master plan.
Reality Check: Observe public interaction with the completed installation, noting the potential for theft and subsequent police intervention.
